text: @GOP During @realDonaldTrump’s next televised campaign rally (euphemistically called a press briefing) Americans won't forget, while 50,000+ Americans died because of the coronavirus, he blocked & delayed testing while promoting untested drugs & voodoo treatment like drinking bleach.
